directions: Dressing: In blender, blend together diced pear, oil, pear nectar, vinegar, lemon juice, mustard, salt and pepper until smooth.
Salad: Put lettuce, pear, avocado, hazelnuts and tuna in bowl. Toss with the dressing.
ingredients: ½ large ripe Bartlett pear, peeled, cored, diced
1 tbsp plus 1½ tsp apple cider vinegar
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper
1 head butter lettuce, cut into 1-inch pieces, about 4 cups
½ large ripe Barlett pear, peeled, cored, diced
¼ cup hazelnuts (preferably skinned), toasted, and coarsely chopped
2 (4-oz) cans tuna, packed in olive oil, drained, flaked into ½-in pieces
title: Butter lettuce and tuna salad with pear dressing
